thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es
thread.title: Patricia J Hyland
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por Patricia J Hyland

author: Patricia J Hyland
title: Patricia J Hyland
text:
My reservation agent, Vikram, was patient, courteous, beyond helpful, informative, well-informed and confirmed all my information more than once. That was all very reassuring and much appreciated.
Based on this experience, I would definitely use your service again
thank you to eDreams and especially to Vikram !
